segments.text: I observe the kitchen's daily routine unfolding.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink water is running over the edge now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's creating a sheet of water down the front.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Woman's focused on her dish, foot in the puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's reaching high into the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Stool's unstable, wobbling under his weight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's balancing a plate too, clever but risky.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Girl stands ready, hand out for her cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their little secret makes me smile.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Yet the overflow could cause real damage.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Light from the window highlights the garden's peace.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This contrast between calm and chaos is striking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she'll notice in time.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole thing feels a bit heartbreaking.
segments.speaker: PAR
